meanings.definition: A Japanese board game similar to chess.
meanings.sent1: My friend taught me how to play shogi yesterday.
meanings.sent2: During our trip to Japan, we saw people playing shogi in the park.
meanings.sent3: I tried playing shogi with my cat, but she kept knocking over the pieces.
meanings.sent4: The strategic moves in shogi are like a dance on the board.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the shogi pieces being moved is oddly satisfying.

meanings.definition: The act of playing the game of shogi.
meanings.sent1: After school, we always have a quick shogi match.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the concentration required during a game of shogi.
meanings.sent3: My brother challenged me to a shogi match, but he forgot the rules.
meanings.sent4: In the world of shogi, every move counts towards victory.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of a shogi game can be both thrilling and nerve-wracking.
